SEARCH
Package info.kgeorgiy.ja.shulpin.implementor

Class Implementor

java.lang.Object
info.kgeorgiy.ja.shulpin.implementor.Implementor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Impler, JarImpler
public class Implementor extends Object implements JarImpler
Generate .java or .jar implementation of a specified type token. Produced result will be written to the root directory. Implements JarImpler interface, can throw ImplerException while using implement(Class, Path) or implementJar(Class, Path).

  • Constructor Details

    • Implementor

      public Implementor()
      Default constructor.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Generate implementation from console.

      If first argument is -jar implementJar(Class, Path) will be called, implement(Class, Path) otherwise. If implementation can not be generated, warning message will be written to System.err.

      Parameters:
      args - program arguments

    • writePackage

      private void writePackage(Class<?> token, Writer writer) throws IOException
      Write token package to implementation file using Class.getPackageName() only if it is specified in the token.
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for.
      writer - writer which white to .java file while implementing.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

    • encode

      private String encode(String string)
      Encodes string to ascii.
      Parameters:
      string - string which we need to encode.
      Returns:
      encoded string.

    • writeClassBody

      private void writeClassBody(Class<?> token, Writer writer) throws IOException
      Write class body for specified type token.

      Write class name using Class.getSimpleName() with Impl suffix. Specifies token as the implemented interface using Class.getCanonicalName(). To implement the methods, writeMethodBody(Method, Writer) is called for all abstract methods of the token.

      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for.
      writer - writer which white to .java file while implementing.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

    • getMethodModifiers

      private String getMethodModifiers(Method method)
      Returns modifiers of the implemented method.
      Parameters:
      method - method whose modifiers need to be returned.
      Returns:
      method modifiers in the form of a string without abstract/transient.

    • getMethodParameters

      private String getMethodParameters(Method method)
      Returns parameters of the implemented method.
      Parameters:
      method - method whose parameters need to be returned.
      Returns:
      method parameters in the form of a string. Each parameter is written as its canonical name and arg name with its number at the end.

    • getMethodExceptions

      private String getMethodExceptions(Method method)
      Returns exceptions of the implemented method.
      Parameters:
      method - method whose exceptions need to be returned.
      Returns:
      method exceptions in the form of a string with a keyword throws at the beginning.

    • getReturnDefaultValue

      private String getReturnDefaultValue(Method method)
      Returns return value of the implemented method.
      Parameters:
      method - method whose default return value need to be returned.
      • return false if boolean;
      • return 0 if primitive number;
      • return null if reference type;
      • return empty string otherwise.
      Returns:
      Method.getReturnType() default value in the form of a string.

    • writeMethodBody

      private void writeMethodBody(Method method, Writer writer) throws IOException
      Write body for specified method. Method body consists of:
      • Modifiers (using getMethodModifiers(Method));
      • Return type (using Method.getReturnType());
      • Method name (using Method.getName());
      • Parameters (usinggetMethodParameters(Method));
      • Exceptions (usinggetMethodExceptions(Method));
      • Return value (usinggetReturnDefaultValue(Method)).
      Parameters:
      method - method to create implementation for.
      writer - writer which white to .java file while implementing.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

    • delete

      private void delete(Path path)
      Delete file by specified path.

      If deleting is not possible, warning message will be written to System.err.

      Parameters:
      path - The path to delete the file.

    • implement

      public void implement(Class<?> token, Path root) throws info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException
      Generate .java implementation of a specified type token.
      Specified by:
      implement in interface Impler
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for.
      root - root directory.
      Throws:
      info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.

    • getFile

      private static Path getFile(Path root, String path)
      Converts to path leading from root to the file.
      Parameters:
      root - root directory.
      path - path leading to file.
      Returns:
      absolute resulting path.
      Throws:
      InvalidPathException - if the path string cannot be converted to a Path.

    • getFileName

      private static String getFileName(Class<?> token, String extension, String separator)
      Returns full implemented file name.
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for.
      extension - file extension (.java for example).
      separator - separator in file path.
      Returns:
      full file name consists of Class.getPackageName(), Class.getSimpleName() with Impl suffix and specified extension. All names are separated by File.separator.

    • getClassPath

      private static String getClassPath(Class<?> token)
      Returns classpath of the type token.
      Parameters:
      token - type token whose path need to get.
      Returns:
      token classpath in the form of a string
      Throws:
      AssertionError - if it is not possible to work with the required URI.

    • compile

      private void compile(Class<?> token, Path root)
      Compile specified type token at runtime.
      Parameters:
      token - type token to be compiled at runtime.
      root - root directory.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if compiler could not be found.
      AssertionError - if compiler exit code is not 0.

    • implementJar

      public void implementJar(Class<?> token, Path jarFile) throws info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException
      Generate .jar implementation of a specified type token.
      Specified by:
      implementJar in interface JarImpler
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for.
      jarFile - target .jar file.
      Throws:
